title: Coroner, health authorities and police launch investigations into Montreal nursing home after 31 seniors die - The Globe and Mail
description: Coroner, health authorities and police launch investigations into Montreal nursing home after 31 seniors die The Globe and Mail Quebec reports 39 new COVID-19 deaths; confirmed cases rise to almost 13000 CTV News Montreal COVID-19 in Quebec: Gaps remain in Mo…
content: The Quebec government is also facing questions over its response to the outbreak, with relatives such as Keira Whitehead, seen here on April 12, 2020, whose father died two days ago raising concerns that staffing at Herron remained inadequate even after offic… [+11873 chars]
